## Summary
A clear description of the feature you're proposing.

## Motivation
Why would this be valuable? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Implementation
If you have implementation ideas, describe them here.

## Ethical Considerations
How does this interact with the Σ-Matrix governance layer? Any concerns?

## Ecosystem Impact
Does this affect other Or4cl3 systems (NO3SYS, NOΣTIC-7, AeonicNet)?
